string.text: Guys, the military have set up a patrol under the destroyed bridge by the outpost again. I think they've got a sniper there too… but I couldn't see where - had to get out of there fast…
I overheard some soldiers on patrol saying that they keep all their loot on the second floor of the Institute. If there's anyone willing to risk it - go ahead and try to get there.
Be careful. The military seem to have settled here for good. Their base is in the Institute. I saw several dozen men and a sniper on the roof.
Dear stalkers… I urgently require a Night Star… Will pay well… I heard there's one at the outpost from the last blowout…

Attention all… Bandits have set up a guard post at the factory again. They're taking loot from stalkers… If there are any experienced guys around there, go scare them off, please… I'll be make to reward you.
Attention all… Brothers, don't go to the checkpoint… Some idiots attacked a patrol… basically it's pretty hot there right now… They're bound to send out a punitive unit.
One of the Barman's couriers got taken at the checkpoint recently with a lot of loot… The stuff, a crate of artifacts, is kept by the commander somewhere… If anyone's bored of life - try your luck.
I saw a group of dogs, 20 or 30 of them, to the East of the bridge… Make up your own conclusions…
Attention all. I saw a lot of Electras to the North of the bridge about 100 meters from the abandoned APC… If you use this info, you owe me a beer or three.
I am at the Dump and there is a shitstorm of blind dogs here… I think new hordes of them have come from the center, be careful.
I think I just saw some Duty fighters at the Dump. I wonder who they're after…
Stay away from the Dark Valley - whole gangs of zombies are crawling out of there… Save your ammo too. The Valley should have been cleaned up a long time ago…what are Duty playing at?
Black Fedya got shot in the garages… I've got a feeling the bandits are back.
There are three guys camping in the garages… Everyone be careful - looks like the bastards are back to their old ways.
Hawkeye is back! I just heard it from people who know… Back from the center! Then it's possible, it's possible! Soon we'll make a massive push for the center and we'll see who comes out on top…
…guys, I'm in a bad way. If there's anyone around the rusty lake, help me out, I'll pay… Gonna try to get out myself…
…Vasya says another marked guy appeared, just left the Trader. You know what to do…
